title: Upholstery Textile, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: wool warp, linen weft
Technique: plain weave with depressed warp and symmetrical knotting
description: Two pieces of knotted pile upholstery fabric for the seat and back of a chair. Naturalistic flowers in multi-colors in a black background.

Upholstery Textile, late 17th century.Medium: wool warp, linen weft
